alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 9:45PM EST until February 28 at 9:15AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... West Virginia... Ohio River At Point Pleasant affecting Gallia and Mason Counties. For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River At Point Pleasant. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 41.0 feet, The Addison, Blaville Road in Ohio is flooded and low lying areas surrounding Point Pleasant and vicinity are flooded due to backwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 40.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EST Saturday was 40.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 41.0 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 41.0 feet on 02/07/1903. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 945 AM EST.
